product_name: Pearl Izumi X-Alp Drift III Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: With their women-specific fit, the Pearl Izumi X-Alp Drift III Bike Shoes combine the performance, comfort and versatility of a bike shoe with the ventilation of a sport sandal. Extremely open and highly breathable mesh/synthetic uppers are especially comfortable in hot weather. Designed for barefoot comfort without socks. Quick-lacing system on the Pearl Izumi X-Alp Drift III Bike Shoes secures evenly. EVA foam midsoles are like what's in your running shoes, offering walking comfort off the bike. Carbon-rubber lugged outsoles provide superior traction and durability.
